Tucson puts an arm around Stanton's shoulders and does the best he can not =
to allow his knees to buckle underneath him.  He was content with how the m=
eeting went.  He turns his head toward Leo Prime.

" Your meeting was very =
helpful and went extremely well.  I commend you on outstanding communicatio=
n and patience.  Keep up the good work".

He narrows a brow.  

" if you co=
uld, please tell Rodimus to meet me in the CR chamber quarters.  I need to =
know why he did not return to the meeting." 

With that said he turns back =
to Stanton.

" Sorry I stalled you, I'm ready now."

Quickstride looks to L=
egacy as Tucson is escorted to CR.  

" Oh boy, he's gonna be in CR a long =
time.  He didn't look so good.  Anyway, lemme show ya what I have so far on=
 the turbines.  The wind turbine isn't so bad but the hydro turbine is anot=
her story.  We need materials that won't rust and pollute the water sources=
 here.  Hopefully there are such materials."

He scratches behind his left =
ear in brwilderment.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
